additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 80 health, 0.4 health regen, 0.67 armor, 4 attack speed, 48 mana, 0.2 mana regen and 4 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 80 health, 0.4 health regen, 0.67 armor, 4 attack speed, 48 mana, 0.2 mana regen and 4 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 80 health, 0.4 health regen, 0.67 armor, 4 attack speed, 48 mana, 0.2 mana regen and 4 attack damage.
name: Crown
description: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.
